about_the_game:
Halloween SPOOKY PACK!


As an indie game, Project Genesis' pre-alpha development is only possible with your support!

In honor of the Halloween season that never ends on Steam, we are offering two badges, three new emblems, and a themed color palette to customize your battle craft and avatar. We thank you for believing in us and hope you'll choose to showcase your participation in the earliest days of Project Genesis pre-alpha development by showing off your gear.

Included in this Support Pack:
  • TWO unique Halloween badges
  • THREE new Halloween emblems
  • TEN custom-color palette for your battle craft and avatars

In honor of Anubis, the god of the dead, look like a killer:
  • on the leaderboards
  • in your assault pod
  • fighting battle craft in space theater
  • in close-quarter avatar combat

With THREE new emblems being added for the 2022 Halloween season, you can now send your enemies back to spawn in style, with the Spider, Witch, or GhostCorps emblems at your disposal to give them a little extra to look at in their death cam.
